articles.title: Game 7: After a back-and-forth NBA Finals, it's time for the Thunder and Pacers to decide the title - AP News
articles.description: Oklahoma City Thunder coach Mark Daigneault knows exactly why the NBA Finals are coming down to a Game 7. He says it's a contest of wills. He's not wrong. Back and forth they have gone, the Thunder and the Indiana Pacers. Indiana led the series, then Oklahoma…
articles.content:
OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) Oklahoma City Thunder coach Mark Daigneault knows exactly why the NBA Finals are coming down to a Game 7.
Its a contest of wills, he said.
And to this point, neither side has los… [+2347 chars]
